greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerator of Sum_{k=1..n} (-1)^(k+1)/k^4.
comment: p divides a(p-1) for prime p > 2 - similar to Wolstenholme's theorem for A007406(n) (= numerator of Sum_{k=1..n} 1/k^2) and for A007410(n) (= numerator of Sum_{k=1..n} 1/k^4).
Lim_{n -> infinity} a(n)/A334585(n) = A267315 = (7/8)*A013662. - _Petros Hadjicostas_, May 07 2020
results.author: _Alexander Adamchuk_, Jul 10 2006
